Power Transmission Company in India

India's Trusted EPC Partner for Transmission Line Construction, Monopole Erection & Stringing Services

Contact Us

As a leading Power Transmission Company in India, Dwizzy Infra specializes in delivering complete EPC (Engineering, Procurement & Construction) solutions for transmission line foundations, monopole erection, lattice tower installation, and HT/LT stringing across India. We execute projects across 66kV, 132kV, 220kV, 400kV and higher voltage levels with unmatched precision, advanced equipment, and certified engineering expertise.

Whether it's a cross-country transmission line, a high-rise monopole installation, or heavy-duty stringing work, we ensure end-to-end EPC project execution—from design engineering and procurement to construction, testing, and final handover.

About Us

Who We Are

Dwizzy Infra is a trusted name in heavy civil construction, specializing in power transmission, foundations, monopole erection, pile work, and special cage fabrication. With advanced equipment, strict safety standards, and proven expertise, we deliver reliable, high-precision infrastructure solutions across India.

Why Choose Us

Why Choose Us as Your Power Transmission Partner?

As a preferred contractor for leading agencies, we bring unmatched expertise and reliability to every project.

1

End-to-End Transmission Line Capabilities

  • ● Transmission line foundations
  • ● Monopole & lattice tower erection
  • ● Multi-circuit tower installation
  • ● Stringing work (HT/LT lines)
  • ● Heavy lifting with telescopic cranes
  • ● Testing & quality checks
  • ● Project documentation & compliance
2

Expertise Across Major Voltage Levels

We execute transmission and distribution projects across:

  • ● 66kV
  • ● 132kV
  • ● 220kV
  • ● 400kV
  • ● Multi-circuit & special alignment works
3

Safety-First Execution

Every installation follows proven safety protocols, equipment certifications, and strict supervision to reduce operational risk and ensure long-term reliability.

4

Proven Track Record

We have delivered high-value power transmission projects for top contractors such as Afcons, L&T, NCC, HGIEL, and more.

Our Services

Our Power Transmission Services in India

A complete suite of services designed to support India's growing energy infrastructure.

1. Transmission Line Foundation Work

  • ● Pile foundations
  • ● Open foundations
  • ● Raft & well foundations
  • ● Ground improvement engineering

We handle challenging terrains, including urban zones, highways, rail corridors, and river crossings.

2. Monopole Erection Services

Specialized in:

  • ● Heavy-duty monopoles
  • ● Multi-circuit monopoles
  • ● 66kV/132kV/220kV/400kV monopole erection
  • ● Heavy lifting up to 75 meters using telescopic cranes

Key Benefits:

  • • Faster installation
  • • Minimal land acquisition
  • • Ideal for urban and congested areas

3. Lattice Tower Erection

  • ● D-shaped, angle, and steel towers
  • ● NBT towers
  • ● I-girder erection

We ensure strong tower alignment, precise tightening, and safe rigging checks.

4. Conductor & OPGW Stringing

  • ● Pilot rope & tension stringing
  • ● HT/LT line stringing
  • ● Conductor sagging
  • ● OPGW installation
  • ● Testing & safety checks

Execution with high-precision stringing equipment for seamless power flow.

5. Heavy Lifting & Crane Operations

Our fleet includes advanced telescopic cranes used for:

  • ● Tower & monopole lifting
  • ● Beam girder positioning
  • ● High-elevation installations

Industries & Clients We Serve

Trusted by: Afcons, L&T, NCC, HPL, HGIEL, Bajaj Electricals, and more.

We deliver transmission line solutions for:

● Government utilities

● Power distribution companies

● EPC contractors

● Railway & metro projects

● Infrastructure developers

● Industrial & commercial clients

Our Project Execution Approach

1

Site Evaluation & Survey

We inspect terrain, soil strength, alignment, and design requirements.

2

Engineering & Planning

Detailed method statements, lifting plans, crane placement, and QC processes.

3

Foundation & Erection Execution

On-site supervision, equipment deployment, and safe installation methods.

4

Quality Control & Testing

Bolt torque checks, sagging verification, and structural stability tests.

5

Final Handover & Documentation

As-built drawings, testing reports, and compliance certificates.

Technical Capabilities

Rigging team with 10+ years of on-site experience

Telescopic cranes with height capacity up to 75 meters

Load testing machines for static & dynamic pile tests

Auto-level, total station & measurement tools

Dedicated safety officers at every project

Heavy foundation tools & specialized lifting equipment

Frequently Asked Questions

What makes you a leading EPC Power Transmission Company in India?

We handle engineering, procurement, foundation construction, monopole erection, tower installation, stringing, testing, and handover—making us a true end-to-end EPC contractor.

Do you work on government or tender-based projects?

Yes, we work with leading contractors and government utilities across India.

What areas do you serve?

We operate across all states in India, including Delhi NCR, Uttar Pradesh, Maharashtra, Rajasthan, Haryana, Gujarat, and more.

Can you handle high-altitude and challenging sites?

Yes, we are equipped for complex terrains, metro corridors, expressways, and restricted-access zones.

What voltage levels do you specialize in?

66kV, 132kV, 220kV, 400kV, and multi-circuit monopole projects.
